column1: #text=Usually I am going with my ten month old son while my husband is at work .
#text=before I go , I make a list of what we need or else I will buy things that I do not need .
#text=I check sales to make sure I get the best deals on things and make a meal plan .
#text=Then I get my son in the car and we drive over the the grocery store .
#text=We get a cart and I put my son in it .
#text=I give him a toy and secure it to the cart after I wipe it down to make sure its clean , and we enter the store .
#text=We go through the store and using my list grab what I need .
#text=Since i usually go two or more times a week , I only spend about 3 minutes there before I have all we need and can pay .
#text=Then we go back out to the car .
#text=I put my son back in his car seat and the bagged groceries in the trunk and head home .
